# `NluDetectionInput` Definition

| Property | Type | Required | Description |
|----------|------|----------|-------------|
| text | `string` | Yes | The text to perform NLU detection on. |
| language | `string` | No | Language of the version for multilingual detection, e.g. `en-us`, `de-de` |
